fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
JUUL Labs follows and engages with stakeholders in areas relevant to our business and our mission, such as: 
 
- Regulatory issues related to electronic cigarettes 
- Indirect taxation other than VAT 
- The regulation of chemical products 
- Movement of excisable product 
- Better regulation 
- International Trade 
- Directives relevant to CE marking of electronic goods 
- Sustainable waste disposal
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Our mission is to improve the lives of the world’s one billion smokers. JUUL was founded by former smokers, James Monsees and Adam Bowen. We envision a world where fewer people use cigarettes, and where people who smoke cigarettes have the tools to reduce or eliminate their consumption entirely, should they so desire. As scientists, product designers and engineers, we believe that vaping can have a positive impact when used by smokers, and can have a negative impact when used by nonsmokers. Our goal is to maximize the positive and reduce the negative.
